summary: An email from an FBI New York office requesting assistance to set up two people with CAIR accounts to support a media review for the Epstein case. The email is directed to another FBI office for coordination.

events.title: FBI Request for Media Review Assistance
events.description: An FBI office in New York sends an email requesting assistance to set up two people with CAIR accounts to support a media review for the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The FBI was conducting a media review related to the Epstein case as of October 2020.
The FBI requested assistance to set up two people with CAIR (likely an FBI system) accounts to support this review.
The email indicates ongoing investigative or administrative work on the Epstein case by the FBI.
